item.title: Teens who use weed before age 15 have more trouble later, a study finds

item.title: An Alzheimer's pill appears to protect some in a high-risk population
item.description: A new study is reviving hope that a twice-daily pill can slow down Alzheimer's in people whose genes put them at high risk for the disease.
